basics.name: AFSCME UNION PRESIDENT
basics.label: Operations Manager
basics.summary: Focused Operations Manager (union president) successful in contract negotiation and process improvement.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Highly involved in the oversight and operations of Local 2534's Union office. Prepare and conduct training to other Locals. Vice President on AFSCME District Council 90's board.
highlights: Became the vice president of AFSCME District Council 90 eboard
Developed more efficient filing system and grievance database protocols
Planned and executed trainings/meetings, lunches and special events for groups of 10 to 100+ employees
Developed and implemented first union president manual outlining all proper business procedures and office policies

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Provided operational support to the Section Aviation Manager. Planned, directed, coordinated and controlled all aspects of public or private airports/heliports ensuring they complied with state regulations.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Supported the Policy and Planning Division with accounting and administrative duties within the grants and revolving loan program.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Assisted with day to day operations for the operations of Department of Transportation's Riverside Office Center mailroom. Coordinated different types of mailing machines in ensure proper distribution.
